title: How to find an international penpal - Quora

response.answer_text: InterPals Penpals  - Make friends online and find free pen pals from around the world! I have used this website personally and now have penpals. It's nice and you can actually talk to people before deciding if you want to give them your home address or now. Lots of spammers are also active on the site, which makes things a bit difficult, but it works. Good luck finding a penpal!

If you want snail mail penpals you cold try out we're all postal here! "The Postal Society" connects like-minded snailmailers. I found some great friends there.Apart from that I agree about Interpals.
